title: mummoorthulu gumigooDi
sahitya:
mummUrtulu gumigUDi pogaDEDi muccaTa vinukOrE



anupallavi



 sammatiga rAju koDukanaga vinisamshayamu dIrakashrI rAmuni



caraNam



 rOsamutO raghurAmuni guNamula rUDhiga dama guNamula naTu vrAsi 

trAsuna niDa sari nilvaga lEdani tyAgarAjanutu-DevvaDO anucunu
